short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search engine for your online activity

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Linkr changes the way you access and use previously visited content. Transform your web history into a dynamic library making each link discoverable through a quick search. 

Say goodbye to tab chaos! Linkr simplifies tab management by offering a quick and intuitive way to find, switch between, and manage open tabs, enhancing overall browsing productivity.


Features:
🔎 Full-text search for bookmarks, open tabs or history links
💿 Archive every visited page
🚀 Raycast-like launcher
📑 Change open tab
😶‍🌫️ Fully local, ensuring complete privacy
📙 Tag-based bookmark manager (coming soon!)
☁️ Cloud sync for seamless browsing across devices (coming soon!)
